scriptLines: query: (concat('SELECT CONCAT(\'01|\', \'20220720_163205\') AS LINE UNION ALL SELECT T.LINE FROM (SELECT CONCAT(\'02|\', ACCNT_ID) AS LINE FROM CREDIT_UAT.CC_UPDATE_CA_INFO WHERE STATUS = \'P\' ORDER BY CA_ID ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 50000 ROWS ONLY) T UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(\'09|\' , CONVERT(varchar(255), COUNT(T2.LINE))) AS LINE FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(\'02|\', ACCNT_ID) AS LINE FROM CREDIT_UAT.CC_UPDATE_CA_INFO WHERE STATUS = \'P\' ORDER BY CA_ID ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 50000 ROWS ONLY) T2')),

value.value:
@concat('DECLARE @LINES VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @LINES = CONCAT(@LINES,CHAR(10),'''') + [LINE]
FROM (',variables('scriptQuerySelect'),') 
SELECT CONCAT((SELECT
	CONCAT(''01|'',',variables('processTime'),') AS LINE),(SELECT @LINES),CHAR(10),(SELECT
	CONCAT(''09|'' , CONVERT(varchar(255),
	COUNT(T2.LINE))) AS LINE
FROM
	(',variables('scriptQuerySelect'),') T2)) AS LINE;')

value.value:
@concat('SELECT
	''01|'' + ''',variables('processTime'),''' AS LINE  
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT T.LINE FROM (',variables('scriptQuerySelect'),') T
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT ''09|'' + CONVERT(varchar(255),COUNT(T2.LINE)) AS LINE FROM (',variables('scriptQuerySelect'),') T2; ')

@concat('SELECT CONCAT(
''02|'',TEMP.PHX_ROW_ID
,''|'',TEMP.EXISTING_ROW_ID
,''|'',TEMP.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM
,''|'',TEMP.LIMIT_MNY
,''|'',TEMP.THRESHOLD_ID
,''|'',TEMP.REQUEST_ID
,''|'',TEMP.ACTION_TYPE
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.ACTION_DTM)
,''|'',TEMP.REASON_CODE
,''|'',TEMP.REASON_SUBCODE
,''|'',TEMP.ASSIGN_NO
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT)
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),TEMP.CREATED)
,''|'',TEMP.CREATED_BY
,''|'',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
,''|'',TEMP.LAST_UPD_BY
,''|'',TEMP.SEQ_NO
,''|'',TEMP.CREDIT_GRADE
,''|'',TEMP.ARPU
,''|'',TEMP.MIN_REVIEW
,''|'',TEMP.SUM_MAIN
,''|'',TEMP.NEXT_BILL_DATE
,''|'',TEMP.PHX_OPERATION
) AS LINE FROM (
SELECT ROW_ID AS PHX_ROW_ID,REF_ROW_ID AS EXISTING_ROW_ID,BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,
LIMIT_MNY ,THRESHOLD_ID ,REQUEST_ID ,ACTION_TYPE ,ACTION_DTM ,REASON_CODE ,REASON_SUBCODE ,
ASSIGN_NO ,TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,CREATED ,CREATED_BY ,LAST_UPD ,LAST_UPD_BY ,SEQ_NO ,
CREDIT_GRADE ,ARPU ,MIN_REVIEW ,SUM_MAIN ,NEXT_BILL_DATE ,''Insert'' AS PHX_OPERATION
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, CREATED) = CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
UNION ALL
SELECT ASSIGN_ROW_ID AS PHX_ROW_ID,ASSIGN_REF_ROW_ID AS EXISTING_ROW_ID,BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM,
LIMIT_MNY ,THRESHOLD_ID ,REQUEST_ID ,ACTION_TYPE ,ACTION_DTM ,REASON_CODE ,REASON_SUBCODE ,
ASSIGN_NO ,TEMP_EXPIRE_DAT ,CREATED ,CREATED_BY ,LAST_UPD ,LAST_UPD_BY ,SEQ_NO ,
CREDIT_GRADE ,ARPU ,MIN_REVIEW ,SUM_MAIN ,NEXT_BILL_DATE ,''Delete'' AS PHX_OPERATION
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN_AT 
WHERE CONVERT(Date, BATCH_CREATED) = CONVERT(Date, GETDATE())
)TEMP ORDER BY TEMP.PHX_ROW_ID
OFFSET ',variables('offset'),' ROWS FETCH NEXT ',string(int(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),' ROWS ONLY')

value.value:
@concat('SELECT CONCAT(''02|'',TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,''|'',TEMP.ACCNT_NO) AS LINE
FROM (SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT IS NULL  
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 	     
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
	((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
	  + 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	)
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  <=  ( SELECT top 1 CAST(lov_val1 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CFG_LOV c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_CUSTOMER_NEW_OLD'' and lov_name = ''Existing'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )      
  AND ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE()+1) As Date) )
	  ) 
UNION ALL	  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg =''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )   
  AND  ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, (SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), B.BA_REGISTER_DT) As Date) )
	) 
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE())+1 As Date)  
UNION ALL  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,B.ACCNT_NO
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
INNER JOIN ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN C ON C.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM = B.ACCNT_NO AND C.REASON_SUBCODE IN(''1863'',''1864'') AND C.ACTION_DTM < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) 
WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
)TEMP
GROUP BY TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO
ORDER BY TEMP.ACCNT_NO OFFSET ',variables('offset'),' ROWS FETCH NEXT ',string(int(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),' ROWS ONLY')

@concat('SELECT
	''01|'' + ''',variables('processTime'),''' AS LINE  
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT T.LINE FROM (',variables('baScriptQuery'),') T
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT ''09|'' + CONVERT(varchar(255),COUNT(T2.LINE)) AS LINE FROM (',variables('baScriptQuery'),') T2; ')
